name: Dichess
description:
Dichess is a game where you move a die to eliminate all the enemies.

When the die moves, it has the chess piece movement on the face of the die.  The die rolls 90 degrees to move a step, causing it to change the piece facing the top.

Roll your die to drive back the enemies in the temple!

Sorry, THERE IS NO LOADING BAR, please wait for the game to load. It wouldn't take long.

You can move your die as follows.
